{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$5.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with WORLD FUEL SERVICES.

Across 2,762 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 22 have at least one amendment (1%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was -12% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$-354.6K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.02 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$34.7K. The longest contract was 2 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
